extendedInfo.description: China Navigation is a professional Car, Bike, and Pedestrian Navigation system. We spend several years to produce it. Now it is available on Android.We use vector  map to greatly reduce the size of map data.Just download this app,no additional data should be downloaded.Features: * Turn by turn GPS navigation makes your phone to an advanced GPS device. * Using animation to show navigation route. * The only map app offers street names using both local language and english language. * Offer 2D and 3D map display. * Offer vector map so that you can zoom at any level. * Offline work can make you save money. * Offer cool compass function. * Offer offline route navigation. * Strong offline address database and a online database as a compensation. * Smart navigation arrow can help you find directions easily. * Support car, bike, walk, truck and horse navigation.
